1、第一步，用solc把用solidity的编写的只能合约源文件，编译成为abi文件,命令为：

```
solc --abi  stringdemo.sol
```

这样子，编译后的内容将从控制台输出。类似以下内容

```
======= stringdemo.sol:StringDemo =======
Contract JSON ABI 
[{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"getName","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"string"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"name":"_name","type":"string"}],"name":"setName","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}]
```

我们把这段内容拷贝下来

```
[{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"getName","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"string"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"name":"_name","type":"string"}],"name":"setName","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}]
```

保存为stringDemo.abi文件

2、用abigen将ABI转换为我们可以导入的Go文件，用上面得到的stringDemo.abi文件作为输入。

```
abigen --abi=stringDemo.abi --pkg=stringDemo --out=stringDemo.go
```

通过以上命令，我们就得到了一个package name为stringDemo的stringDemo.go文件

3、使用solc命令生成bytecode也就是字节码文件

```
solc --bin stringDemo.sol

======= stringDemo.sol:StringDemo =======
Binary: 

```

我们需要的是

```

```

这段内容,把它保存为stringDemo.bin文件

我们需要把合约的部署和合约的调用都整合起来。用一条命令来解决

```
abigen --bin=stringDemo.bin --abi=stringDemo.abi --pkg=stringDemo --out=stringDemo.go 
```

这样我们就把合约的部署代码和调用合约的代码都导出到一个stringDemo.go文件中，这样我们在项目中就可以导入该文件完成我们的工作。
